event.title: Keynote about universal computing at GUADEC, Gothenburg, Sweden

body.p: On Friday 6 August at 13:45 FSFE's Vice President Matthias Kirschner will give a keynote at GUADEC titled “An endangered species: the computer as a universal machine”. GUADEC 2015 takes place in Gothenburg from the 7 to 12 August, the first three days in the Folkets Hus the others at the IT University.
